body:
What type of clothes do you guys wear?  And what type of clothes do you like the opposite sex wearing?

Lets avoid sexism (i like it when girls wear...)


            I'm into a kinda preppy, but more sporty look now  (elites/vineyard vines)


        And I like it when girls wear skinny jeans/dresses/ those cowgirl boots
body_tagged:
What type of clothes do you guys wear?  And what type of clothes do you like the opposite sex wearing?

Lets avoid sexism (i like it when girls wear...)


            I'm into a kinda preppy, but more sporty look now  (elites/vineyard vines)


        And I like it when girls wear skinny jeans/dresses/ those cowgirl boots
title: Fashion Page

replies.body:
I have a weird love for scarves on guys. For girls, loose fitting sweaters. I don't like tight fitting clothes on either gender. X3

Edit: what a hypocrite I can be. I wear yoga pants all the time. Shirts vary, but they're always loose fitting. I tend to wear a lot of hoodies, too.

Edit2: Suits. Suits. Just suits. Even in girls they're perfect. How could I forget about them ^-^
replies.body_tagged:

Edit: what a hypocrite I can be. I wear yoga pants all the time. Shirts vary, but they're always loose fitting. I tend to wear a lot of hoodies, too.

Edit2: Suits. Suits. Just suits. Even in girls they're perfect. How could I forget about them ^-^
